title: Ingliz tili bo'yicha test
subject: Ingliz tili
description: Ingliz tili boyicha advanced darajada test

sections.title: Articles and To Be
sections.instruction: To'g'ri artikllarni (a, an, the) yoki 'to be' fe'lining to'g'ri shaklini (am, is, are, was, were, been, being) qo'ying.

questions.questionText: London is ______ capital of Great Britain.
questions.explanation: 'The' artikli noyob narsa haqida gapirganda ishlatiladi. Bu yerda London Britaniyaning yagona poytaxti.

questions.questionText: I ______ very happy to see you again.

questions.explanation: 'An' artikli unli tovushdan boshlanadigan so'zlar oldidan ishlatiladi. 'Honest' so'zining talaffuzi unli tovush bilan boshlanadi.

questions.questionText: They ______ playing football in the park yesterday.
questions.explanation: 'They' ko'plik olmoshi bilan o'tgan zamonda 'were' ishlatiladi.
'An' artikli unli tovushdan boshlanadigan so'zlar oldidan ishlatiladi. 'Engineer' so'zining talaffuzi unli tovush bilan boshlanadi.
